about: An aspiring developer based in Los Angeles, CA. Former student-nurse turned programmer. Disney fanatic, Theatre Enthusiast, and Master Gardener. I graduate in May 2021!

projects.name: concert
projects.description: Concert is a web application created to allow students to colaborate and interact with eachother virtually. This web application is created using the MERN stack. Some features of this web applications gives students the power to login and have access to tutors and the ablity to make studyrooms, virtual whiteboards, and chatroom.

projects.name: Weather Application
projects.description: This is a weather application that allows you to check current conditions based on your zipcode! This web application utilizes React to create components, in addition to Node.js and Express to facilitate API calls from OpenWeatherMapsAPI as well as bing maps.

projects.name: bdupitas.github.io
projects.description: This is my personal webpage that I developed Using HTML, CSS, and Boostrap I was designed my responsive portfolio website website to showcase my work experiences and projects.

experience.title: Computer Lab Technician
responsibilities: Provide Computer Lab patrons with one on one assistance in various computer software programs, internet and other computer related services.
Assists with computer equipment and Software training for USU employees
Assists with, implements and facilitates computer training classes for CSUN students.

experience.title: Senior Lifeguard & Swim Instructor
responsibilities: Responding to emergencies and rescuing swimmers in danger of drowning.
Explaining and enforcing rules, regulations and policies to ensure safety of patrons.

experience.title: Certified Nursing Assistant
responsibilities: Assisted patients with activities of daily living
Worked directly under the charge nurse to in accordance with a patient careplan
Communicated with patients and maintained HIPAA protocol
